add()

add(\Aura\Http\Cookie $cookie)

Add a cookie to the jar. The cookie will not be written until `save()` is called.

Parameters

\Aura\Http\Cookie $cookie

The cookie to be added.

Tags

None found

addFromResponseStack()

addFromResponseStack(\Aura\Http\Message\Response\Stack $stack)

Add cookies from a stack of response messages.

Parameters

\Aura\Http\Message\Response\Stack $stack

Tags

todo

This needs to make sure cookies are attached to the right host and path when there are Location headers (redirects) in the stack.

save()

save() : void

Save the cookies to storage.

Tags

None found

getAll()

getAll(string $matching_url) : array

List all stored cookies with an optional matching URL. The matching URL must contain a scheme and host.

Parameters

string $matching_url

Throws

\Aura\Http\Cookie\Aura\Http\Exception

If the matching URL does not contain a scheme or domain.

Returns

array

Tags

None found
